import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'../App.css';import Card from'react-bootstrap/Card';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Col from'react-bootstrap/Col';import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row';import{Container}from'react-bootstrap';import{PropTypes}from'prop-types';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Inshortnews=props=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);function Apiget(){fetch("https://inshortsapi.vercel.app/news?category=".concat(props.category)).then(response=>response.json()).then(json=>{setData(json.data);});}useEffect(()=>{Apiget();const api=setInterval(()=>{Apiget();},10000);return()=>clearInterval(api);// eslint-disable-next-line
},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{marginTop:"100px",fontFamily:"",textAlign:"center",fontWeight:"900"},children:"News Express - Headlines"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{xs:1,sm:2,md:3,className:"g-4",style:{margin:"20px 0 0 0",display:"flex",justifyContent:"center"},children:data.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{className:"container-fluid mt-3",style:{margin:"0 0 30px 0"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:"20rem"},className:"h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Header,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Link,{href:item.url,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",style:{margin:"0 30px 0 20px"},children:"Video link"})},item.url),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Link,{href:item.readMoreUrl,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",children:"Full article"})},item.readMoreUrl)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",className:"card-img-top img-fluid",style:{width:"20rem",height:"20rem",objectFit:"cover"},src:item.imageUrl},item.imageUrl),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{style:{fontWeight:"700",margin:"0 0 30px 0"},children:item.title},item.title),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{children:["  ",item.content," "]},item.content),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Footer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{className:"text-muted",style:{fontStyle:"italic",fontSize:"12px"},children:["By ",item.author," on ",item.date]},item.author)})]})]})})});})})})]});};Inshortnews.rotoTypes={category:PropTypes.string};export default Inshortnews;
